content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!--<!DOCTYPE metadata SYSTEM "http://www.esri.com/metadata/esriprof80.dtd">--> <metadata xml:lang="en"><Esri><CreaDate>20050111</CreaDate><CreaTime>16350400</CreaTime><SyncOnce>FALSE</SyncOnce><SyncDate>20101011</SyncDate><SyncTime>09424900</SyncTime><ModDate>20101011</ModDate><ModTime>09424900</ModTime><MetaID>{532486A7-BCCF-4415-805F-70C361F3AE44}</MetaID></Esri><idinfo><native Sync="TRUE">Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000</native><descript><langdata Sync="TRUE">en</langdata><abstract>Source water assessment area (SWA) is the Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) interim surface and subsurface area surrounding a public water supply well that completely contains the scientifically calculated time-of-travel (TOT) area. The primary purpose of the SWA is to give the public water supplier an idea of the potential size of the final Wellhead Protection Area (WHPA).  The TOT for a non-vulnerable SWA (Meth_code = FRC) is 3 years and for a vulnerable SWA (Meth_code = AM) is 10 years.   Ultimately the SWA will be replaced by a WHPA and a corresponding Drinking Water Supply Management Area (DWSMA).</abstract><purpose>This dataset was developed with the intention of protecting the public drinking water supply and complies with the federal Safe Drinking Water Act, United States Code, title 42 and the State of Minnesota Rule (parts 4720.5100 to 4720.5590).</purpose></descript><citation><citeinfo><origin>Minnesota Department of Health</origin><pubdate>20101006</pubdate><title>Source Water Assessment Area (SWA)</title><ftname Sync="TRUE">swa</ftname><geoform Sync="TRUE">vector digital data</geoform><onlink>http://health.state.mn.us/divs/eh/water/swp/maps/gis/swa.zip</onlink></citeinfo></citation><timeperd><current>publication date</current><timeinfo><rngdates><begdate>19950711</begdate><enddate>20101006</enddate></rngdates></timeinfo></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>Continually</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc Sync="TRUE">-96.953159</westbc><eastbc Sync="TRUE">-90.303304</eastbc><northbc Sync="TRUE">48.973825</northbc><southbc Sync="TRUE">43.445091</southbc></bounding><lboundng><leftbc Sync="TRUE">210343.546875</leftbc><rightbc Sync="TRUE">697461.000000</rightbc><bottombc Sync="TRUE">4816469.500000</bottombc><topbc Sync="TRUE">5424546.000000</topbc></lboundng></spdom><keywords><theme><themekt>MDH GIS Data Keyword Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>Capture zone</themekey><themekey>Drinking water</themekey><themekey>Source Water Assessment</themekey></theme><place><placekt>MDH GIS Data Place Name Thesaurus</placekt><placekey>Minnesota</placekey></place></keywords><accconst>None</accconst><useconst>None</useconst><natvform Sync="TRUE">Shapefile</natvform><secinfo><secclass>Unclassified</secclass></secinfo></idinfo><dataIdInfo><envirDesc Sync="TRUE">Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3;
